text.content:
This is Bad

You take @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d10.success].

Melee

What are the Odds?

If this is a thrown weapon attack and the target can hold the weapon, the target snatches the weapon out of the air and wields it.

Ranged

Whirlwind of Shame

You hit every creature adjacent to you except for the target.

Unarmed

Jumbled Components

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Slowed]{Slowed 2} until the end of your next turn.

Spell
